<div id="main">

<div id="articleheads">
<h4 class="rubric">Fiction</h4>

<h4 id="articleauthor"><span class="c cs"><span>by</span> <a rel="author" href="http://www.newyorker.com/magazine/bios/john_lanchester/search?contributorName=john%20lanchester">John Lanchester</a></span> <span class="dd dds">January 9, 2012</span></h4>
</div>
<div id="realviewUrl" class="showBlueNote">Subscribers can read this article on our <a href="http://www.newyorker.com/app">iPad app</a> or in our <a href="http://archives.newyorker.com/?i=2012-01-09#folio=060" target="_blank">online archive.</a> (Others can pay for access.)</div>
<div id="articleRail">
<p><img src="http://www.newyorker.com/images/covers/2012/2012_01_09_p323.jpg" alt="January 9, 2012 Issue"/></p>

</div>
<div id="articlebody">
<div id="articletext">
<p class="noindent">ABSTRACT: Short story, set in 2007, about a London banker receiving his year-end bonus.</p>
</div>
<div id="abstractThumbnail">
<div class="img-abstract-left"><a href="http://archives.newyorker.com/?i=2012-01-09#folio=060" target="_blank"><img src="http://static.cdn.realviewdigital.com/global/content/GetImage.aspx?pguid=FC9071DC-DD99-441F-A727-1B74670350BC&amp;width=232&amp;i=2012-01-09&amp;folio=060" title="read the full text..." alt="read the full text..."/></a></div>

</div>
</div>
